How many people are affected by Hennekam syndrome ?,At least 50 cases of Hennekam syndrome have been reported worldwide.,GHR,Hennekam syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Hennekam syndrome ?,"Mutations in the CCBE1 or FAT4 gene can cause Hennekam syndrome.  The CCBE1 gene provides instructions for making a protein that is found in th
